mapper.select:
SELECT group_id AS groupid, group_name AS groupname, config_param1 AS configparam1, config_param2 AS configparam2, config_param3 AS configparam3, config_param4 AS configparam4, config_param5 AS configparam5, del_flg AS delflg, register_user_id AS registeruserid, register_date AS registerdate, update_user_id AS updateuserid, update_date AS updatedate
FROM group_master ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(group_id,'00000')
